items.title: Become your best self: Achieve breakthrough transformation

visible_instructors.name: Rohit
visible_instructors.title: Rohit Sethi
visible_instructors.job_title: Self-Enrichment Author | Business Consultant | Results Coach

items.headline: Transformational journey. Self-image. Beliefs. Charisma. Passion. Goal-setting. Mind control. Self-talk. Time management
objectives_summary: Learn key principles from the world of self-help/ personal development in form of a comprehensive curriculum (as against scattered pieces of advice on individual topics, which are not very effective!)
Assess your current situation along the various life areas: Physical (Health), Intellectual (Work), Social (Relationships), Financial (Money), and Spiritual (Soul)
Define your target aspirational states for each life area and create a transformational roadmap to bridge the gap between current and target states

Proven Strategies, Techniques and Methods That Are Easy & Practical To Use
HQ Videos Filmed in Exotic Locations To Make Learning Thrilling And Fun

items.title: Be Your Own Stylist | Feel Confident & Love Your Style
items.headline: Learn the tips of a personal stylist: how to style your body, shop with success, and enjoy getting dressed!
objectives_summary: The best methods to style your body (even through size changes!)
Exactly what your style is and how to embrace it
The myth of body types and what to do instead

items.title: EFT Tapping 4 - Weight Loss, Improved Body Image, No Dieting

visible_instructors.name: Cha~zay
visible_instructors.title: Cha~zay Sandhriel Ph.D.
visible_instructors.job_title: Best-Selling Instructor, Author and Podcast Host

items.headline: Fall in love with your beautiful body temple - using EFT techniques that can help you shed the weight without dieting!
objectives_summary: Use EFT to tap away any blockages that prevent you from choosing foods that are healthy for you (lose interest in foods that are not beneficial for you).
Apply EFT techniques to helping you love what is good for you (let go of destructive behavior).
Truly and genuinely love your body temple with EFT, no matter the shape or size of your body.

Know why mindfulness is such an important part of being able to live in the present moment
Implement a mindfulness meditation and walking meditation practice daily

How to treat your health to boost your mental abilities.

items.headline: The Law of Attraction's Missing Instructions for Manifesting Your Best Life!
objectives_summary: Attract more money and abundance into their lives.
Find out their limiting beliefs and the wall of doubt and fear they have.
Know the 7 step system for manifestation.

Discover your personal path of least resistance to your greatest well-being and success in ANY given moment

items.title: The Complete Guide To The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI)
items.headline: Learn about the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator® and the personality theory behind it.
objectives_summary: The fundamentals of the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator.
What your 4-letter code really means, and how to decode it.
The theory behind the MBTI: Jung's cognitive functions.

items.headline: How to use Remote Viewing and your intuitive ability to solve problems for an optimum life trajectory.
objectives_summary: You will be able to distinguish between real Intuitive data and junk information.
You'll be able reliably predict one of the top 3 winners of any Horse race.
Your intuitive skills will be vastly augmented to help in work and your personal life.

items.title: Passport to Communication Skills
items.headline: Sharpen your communication skills with PCS
objectives_summary: All those students who have completed their schooling and are ready to take off for higher education.

items.title: Mindfulness - Professional Sound Training.
items.headline: A powerful sound training that lets you actually experience mindfulness as you listen to calming nature sounds.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have a better understanding of the concepts of mindfulness.
You will know what it's like to be fully in the present moment and the positive effects it can have on your mood and stress level.
You will have a better notion of how being in the present moment can help you get rid of suffering from future and/or past related thoughts.

items.title: The Business, Innovation and Entrepreneurship Masterclass

visible_instructors.name: Kain
visible_instructors.title: Kain Ramsay
visible_instructors.job_title: Social Entrepreneur, Applied Psychology Instructor & Author

items.headline: An expert-led Masterclass with everything you need to know about launching and scaling a sustainable business enterprise
objectives_summary: Learn about essential business areas such as finance, sales, marketing, management, versatility, efficient communication and resolution.
Studying business and entrepreneurship will teach you how to cultivate a growth-orientated mindset and think outside the box innovatively.
Become aware of all the fundamental aspects of business, from starting-up to scaling-up, and recognising how they all influence each other.
